entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • app.UseRouting must be called after `UsePathBase` #48370
  • Throw custom error types instead of generic errors inside the HubConnection class #48362
  • Add a judgment condition in app.UseHttpLogging() #48360
  • [Question] .NET6 Minimal API model binding error handling and Environment. #48355

Closed

  • The different behaviors in Blazor WebAssembly after setting the DefaultLayout property of the AuthorizeRouteView in App.razor. #48310
  • Adding compression directives to a csproj breaks a Linux build with DN8P4 #48353
  • (WebSockets transport) There was an error with the transport #48303
  • Found Medium Risk in SCA scan with NuGet Package Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.Features (CVE-2022-21986) #48359

PullRequests

Created

  • Unquarantine `IHttpActivityFeatureIsPopulated` #48371
    area-infrastructure, area-hosting
  • Migrate RDF-specific tests to shared infrastructure (part 2) #48369
    feature-rdg, area-minimal
  • use new System.Text.Ascii APIs, remove internal helpers #48368
    area-runtime
  • Try updating to python3 #48367
    area-infrastructure
  • Don't run publish-specific Mvc.Testing tasks if project is not publishable #48364
    area-mvc, feature-mvc-testing, 6.0.x

Merged

  • Add some notes on testing trimming #48333
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview5
  • Add IHttpSysRequestTimingFeature to support accessing http.sys timing info #48218
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 8.0-preview5
  • Update BuildFromSource.md to reflect need for VS on Windows #48365
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview5

Updated

  • Update SDK #48252
    area-infrastructure
  • Add a test confirming that X509Certificate is trimmed #48295
    area-hosting
  • Enable Blazor Server and WebAssembly components to run in the same document #48294
    area-blazor
  • [SignalR] Seamless Reconnect #48338
    area-signalr
  • HttpContext debugger display tweaks and fixes #48321
    area-runtime
  • DisableInferBodyFromParameters in RDG. #48269
    area-runtime, feature-rdg, 8.0-preview5
  • Updated the AddPolicyRegistry extension methods to use TryAdd and TryAddEnumerable internally #47821
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • [Blazor] Add new Blazor Web Template #48285
    area-mvc
  • [Blazor] Source generator to create the discovery information at compile time. #48284
    area-blazor
  • Code Fix for AfterOnResourceExecution Diagnostic Event. #48077
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pr: pending author input, area-web-frameworks, pending-ci-rerun
  • Bump selenium-standalone to 8.3.0 - allow E2E testing on osx-arm64 #48288
    area-infrastructure
  • DO NOT REVIEW Stress test x509 test #48332
    area-infrastructure
  • Uses Fallback When Without Repository #48103
    area-dataprotection, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Issue #45096 Toru_Watanbe #48352
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pr: pending author input
  • Improve performance of output cache #48328
    feature-middleware, area-perf, feature-output-caching
  • Use `Type.IsByRefLike`. #48351
    area-runtime, community-contribution
